titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Papers of the Virginia Quarterly Review, 1925-1935
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
The University of Virginia Archives
Special Collections
The University of Virginia Library RG-24/3/1.391
titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
The Papers of the Virginia Quarterly Review
1925-1935
did.physdesc: This collection consists of 1126 items.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: The Papers of the Virginia Quarterly Review, Accession #RG-24/3/1.391, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection is a gift of the editor on January 12, 1939.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of correspondence with contributors during the editorship of James Southall Wilson (1925-1931) and part of the tenure of Stringfellow Barr (1931-1937). Included are almost all of the literary figures of this period, and many from other fields. Authors' original manuscripts together with proofs of almost every article and book review published in the Virginia Quarterly Reviewduring this period. Proofs and manuscripts are filed in a separate sequence, chronologically by date of publication. A slip list of proofs and manuscripts is available in Special Collections.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Correspondence is filed alphabetically. Proofs and manuscripts are individually foldered and filed in a separate sequence, chronologically by date of publication.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aid
otherfindaid.p: A slip list of proofs and manuscripts is available in the Special Collections Department.
